text: The introduction of #Pfizer’s #COVID19 #vaccine has left many #employers grappling with questions regarding #employeesafety and #reopening. #Proskauer zeroes in on the key areas of the #EEOC update here: https://t.co/JuvNNIDIl1  #coronavirus #covidvaccine #pfizervaccine https://t.co/QUPDpUFoUf
